name: GOTTA GO FAST!!!!!
body_text: IF YOUR NEXT ACTIVATION WOULD DEAL ME 10 OR MORE I DODGE IT!!!!!

name: PSHHH, NOTHIN PERSONNEL KID
body_text: IF THERE ARE NO CHARACTERS ON MY BOARD, I GAIN 3 ENERGY!!!!! IF THERE ARE NO CHARACTERS ON YOUR BOARD, I GAIN 3 ENERGY!!!!!

name: SANIC
body_text: EVERY 3RD ATTACK I TRIGGER IS TRIGGERED AN ADDITIONAL TIME!!!!!

name: Blahaj
body_text: Whenever this card is triggered, heal up to 3 HP.

name: Does He Know?
body_text: When setting this card, choose a type X. When this card is activated, if the type of the card opposite this is X, your next attack deals +5 damage.

name: Mind Focused On Profit
body_text: If neither character has taken damage in the last 3 actions, gain 5 energy.

name: Scammed
body_text: If your opponent dealt you damage with their last action, heal up to 8 of that damage.

name: i sleep
body_text: Heal up to 10. If you heal for more than 5, skip your next action.

name: succ
body_text: Your opponent loses 2 HP. You gain 2 HP.
